channel.title: RS: DayZ Mod Release
channel.description:
Every time I went make a DayZ concept server my computer would break, it's been like a curse. Since 2006 I have never released any of my server projects for download. I never saw the point considering how sloppy my work is. I recently found a backup of my latest DayZ server on my phone, that I thought I lost, and so today I am going to make an exception, just in case I lose it again. For more information view my development thread: https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,666997.0
[b]Link removed due to project back in development[/b]: https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,666997.0.html
The base is a real 474 Hyperion (rs2server). I cannot remember if this version has minimap blacking out (need map in inventory and a compass to view minimap/compass, because I had some version control issues which overwrote a days work, and I had to restore it).
Hopefully I can return and improve this once I get my computer fixed.
[b]Disclaimer:[/b] The code is terrible. Like seriously it's the Project Insanity of Hyperion and I admit that. Not proud. Going to go away and learn some OOP Java and hopefully re-create something with a bit more quality.
Things that need fixing are:
[ul][li]NPCs don't combat follow[/li] [li]Ground items are nulled[/li] [li]Need to finish the zombie region spawning system[/li] [li]Need to implement crate looting[/li] [li]I have a fix for the wilderness ditch[/li] [li]I have the code for custom object spawning[/li][/ul]
I hope someone can improve on this a lot and maybe make something a little bit better. Like I said my computer broke so anything I was in the middle of doing came to a halt, that's why there is so many half done systems.
[b]Credits[/b] Graham and the Hyperion team Scu11 and the google team Scully Hyperon/Mendorphins
[img]http://puu.sh/daTA7/146ce79751.png[/img]

item.title: RS: DayZ Mod Release
item.dc:creator: @Hyperon Hyperon
item.description:
@Hyperon wrote:

So my plan worked and I was able to get another laptop and restore my project, so this is now being redeveloped: https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,666997.0.html

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @Welliton_inc Welliton_inc

Love DayZ. Would have loved to play this. It’s sad to see unique servers like this end.

item.title: RS: DayZ Mod Release
item.dc:creator: @Callisto Callisto
item.description:
@Callisto wrote:

[quote=“runescape sucks, post:5, topic:550689”][quote author=kronikz link=topic=669601.msg4479269#msg4479269 date=1428504345]
Wondering if any of these types of servers would be popular.
[/quote]

Servers like this might be popular. Server’s that generally sway off from the normal path of servers(I.E. emulating runescape) generally don’t become too popular, or rather don’t stay popular. However, some have. For example, I remember a hunger games server being very popular at one point.[/quote]

im confused. so are they popular or are they not popular

Read full topic

item.title: RS: DayZ Mod Release
item.dc:creator: @runescape_sucks runescape sucks
item.description:
@runescape_sucks wrote:

kronikz:

Wondering if any of these types of servers would be popular.

Servers like this might be popular. Server’s that generally sway off from the normal path of servers(I.E. emulating runescape) generally don’t become too popular, or rather don’t stay popular. However, some have. For example, I remember a hunger games server being very popular at one point.

Anyways good release. Have you ever hosted one of your servers? Wondering if any of these types of servers would be popular.

item.title: RS: DayZ Mod Release
item.dc:creator: @Hyperon Hyperon
item.description:
@Hyperon wrote:

Every time I went make a DayZ concept server my computer would break, it’s been like a curse. Since 2006 I have never released any of my server projects for download. I never saw the point considering how sloppy my work is. I recently found a backup of my latest DayZ server on my phone, that I thought I lost, and so today I am going to make an exception, just in case I lose it again. For more information view my development thread: https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,666997.0

Link removed due to project back in development: https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,666997.0.html

The base is a real 474 Hyperion (rs2server). I cannot remember if this version has minimap blacking out (need map in inventory and a compass to view minimap/compass, because I had some version control issues which overwrote a days work, and I had to restore it).

Hopefully I can return and improve this once I get my computer fixed.

Disclaimer:
The code is terrible. Like seriously it’s the Project Insanity of Hyperion and I admit that. Not proud. Going to go away and learn some OOP Java and hopefully re-create something with a bit more quality.

Things that need fixing are:

[ul][li]NPCs don’t combat follow[/li]
[li]Ground items are nulled[/li]
[li]Need to finish the zombie region spawning system[/li]
[li]Need to implement crate looting[/li]
[li]I have a fix for the wilderness ditch[/li]
[li]I have the code for custom object spawning[/li][/ul]

I hope someone can improve on this a lot and maybe make something a little bit better. Like I said my computer broke so anything I was in the middle of doing came to a halt, that’s why there is so many half done systems.

Credits
Graham and the Hyperion team
Scu11 and the google team
